=== Edgy issues ===

Green letters/words are written in the upper part of screen in the beginning of installation.
<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/systeminstaller/+bug/29394|Bug 29394]]</nowiki>

Only configured interfaces available in the gnome network applet
<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/gnome-network/+bug/29397|Bug 29397]]</nowiki>
